rows.stringify: $(identity.pronouns.singular) feels more comfortable when away from the sun.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has a deep knowledge of ancient secrets.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has a deep knowledge of ancient magic.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) knows all the best ways to torture someone.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) will only speak common if absolutely forced to.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) never knows the current time and date.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) $(frequency) uses terms from a different language as $(identity.pronouns.singular) speaks.
